thread.section_title: 11 Howard - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Mixed Feelings
thread.title_full: Mixed Feelings - Review of 11 Howard, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah D
title: Mixed Feelings
text:
I was unsure on giving 3 or 4 stars.. ultimately there are a ton of positive things to say about this hotel- I'm just not sure it's everyone's cup of tea!
The main areas are beautiful- we enjoyed lounging in the library and having a drink before dinner.. the area was beautifully decorated and all of the employees were really kind and helpful! For that reason, I can't dog the place.. I really really loved the staff, location and main areas.
That said.... I was so disappointed in the room. The room was super small- I mean, super small even for NYC. The furnishings were fine, but the walls were so badly scraped and nicked- likely because the room was so small (nowhere to move). The bathroom was also very small and cramped. I think the SoHo location can't be beat- I just think the hotel's really high rating gave me a different set of expectations. I think this hotel caters to more of the 35 and younger crowd- not that anyone was less than kind- I just felt I was in more of a Millennial experience.
I would consider this hotel again if looking to stay in the SoHo area for fun- would not recommend it to a business traveler or anyone looking for some space to spread out!
